MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:30PM to safely carry out repair work on our overhead line equipment near to Loan Foot Cottage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 14:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:53 AM on Wednesday, 03 February 2021.
